BAD_REQUEST.message: Bad request. Your request could not be processed. This has been automatically reported.

CONFLICT.message: Request conflicts with the current state

UNPROCESSABLE_ENTITY.message: Your request could not be processed. This is either a client side error or a server error.

TOO_MANY_REQUESTS.message: Too many requests were sent. Please slow down and retry within a minute.

INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR.message: Internal server error occured. It has been automatically reported.

UNKNOWN_ROUTE.message: Requested route does not exist. Unable to handle request.

INVALID_MAIL.message: Missing or invalid target mail address.

CURRENT_MAIL.message: The target mail address is already the current mail address for this user.

MALFORMED_AKEY.message: AKey format is not valid. Must be a string with 6 characters.

MALFORMED_PASSWORD.message: Password must be a string with at least 6 characters and less than 72 characters.

INVALID_TOKEN.message: Provided token is invalid or no longer valid.

LOG_EXPORT_UNAVAILABLE.message: Export log not available. Mostly this means, it is not an autogenerated log or has no data.
